    • Method Detail

      • dateToFilename

        public static java.lang.String dateToFilename(java.lang.String extension)
        Takes current date, separates month, day, and year with underscores and adds a file extension
        Parameters:
        extension - - Extension of a file, usually a .txt
        Returns:
        File name

      • isNumeric

        public static boolean isNumeric(java.lang.String str)
        Checks if a String varialbe consists only of numbers. For example, if a String variable contains "1234" (only numbers), this method will return "true". If a String variable contains even one non-numeric character - "123x4" - this method will return false.
        Parameters:
        str - - String variable - we need to check if it can be converted to a number without an error
        Returns:
        boolean (true/false)
